member.name: T:SassAndCoffee.Core.MemoizingMRUCache`2
member.summary:
This data structure is a representation of a memoizing cache - i.e. a class that will evaluate a function, but keep a cache of recently evaluated parameters.
Since this is a memoizing cache, it is important that this function be a "pure" function in the mathematical sense - that a key *always* maps to a corresponding return value.
member.typeparam: The type of the parameter to the calculation function.
The type of the value returned by the calculation function.

member.name: M:SassAndCoffee.Core.MemoizingMRUCache`2.#ctor(System.Func{`0,System.Object,`1},System.Int32,System.Action{`1})
member.param: The function whose results you want to cache, which is provided the key value, and an Tag object that is user-defined
The size of the cache to maintain, after which old items will start to be thrown out.
A function to call when a result gets evicted from the cache (i.e. because Invalidate was called or the cache is full)

member.name: M:SassAndCoffee.Core.MemoizingMRUCache`2.Get(`0,System.Object)
member.summary: Evaluates the function provided, returning the cached value if possible
member.param: The value to pass to the calculation function.

member.name: M:SassAndCoffee.Core.MemoizingMRUCache`2.Invalidate(`0)
member.summary: Ensure that the next time this key is queried, the calculation function will be called.

member.name: M:SassAndCoffee.Core.MemoizingMRUCache`2.InvalidateAll
member.summary: Invalidate all items in the cache

member.name: M:SassAndCoffee.Core.MemoizingMRUCache`2.CachedValues
member.summary: Returns all values currently in the cache
